title: Kimwolf Botnet Lurking in Corporate, Govt. Networks

title: DiffuCoder: Understanding and Improving Masked Diffusion Models for Code Generation

title: FedUMM: A General Framework for Federated Learning with Unified Multimodal Models
summary: The article discusses FedUMM, a novel framework designed to improve federated learning by integrating unified multimodal models. Federated learning is a machine learning approach where models are trained across decentralized devices holding local data samples, without exchanging them. FedUMM addresses challenges in this field by unifying different data modalities into a cohesive model, enhancing the ability to learn from diverse and distributed datasets effectively.
